contact.title: Contact form
contact.subtitle: If you would like to contact me, please fill out the contact form below.
contact.description: The contact form will be implemented in the next steps. Here you will be able to send a message directly from the site.
contact.subtitleSection: Got questions, feedback, or just want to say hi? Drop a message below ‚Äî I promise my SmartChat won't answer this one for me.
contact.guest.name: Guest
aboutMe.title: About me
aboutMe.intro: Welcome! I am a developer who loves to create modern web applications using the latest technologies.
aboutMe.description: I specialize in React, TypeScript and Tailwind CSS, and I always look for ways to improve the user experience through clean code and modern design.
aboutMe.career.title: My Journey So Far
aboutMe.career.mania.description: Created and maintained responsive websites and digital campaigns. Worked closely with designers to turn creative concepts into functional, user-friendly interfaces.
aboutMe.career.bondex.description: Developed and optimized UI for the Bondex platform ‚Äî a blockchain-based networking and recruitment app. Collaborated with international teams to deliver scalable, high-performing web solutions.
aboutMe.career.endava.description: Built responsive, data-driven applications using React, Vue, Angular, and TypeScript. Focused on performance, accessibility, and seamless user experience across enterprise projects.
aboutMe.tools.title: My Toolbox of Tricks
aboutMe.tools.subtitle: The tech, tools, and platforms that bring my ideas to life (and sometimes mild chaos).
aboutMe.tools.frontend.title: Frontend & UI
aboutMe.tools.frontend.description: Where pixels meet logic ‚Äî and sometimes argue about spacing.
aboutMe.tools.cloud.title: Cloud & DevOps
aboutMe.tools.cloud.description: Because even my code deserves a cloud to nap on.
aboutMe.tools.testing.title: Testing & Quality
aboutMe.tools.versionControl.title: Version Control & Tools
aboutMe.tools.versionControl.description: Keeping chaos organized, one commit at a time.
aboutMe.tools.design.title: Design & Prototyping
aboutMe.tools.design.description: Sometimes I trade semicolons for color palettes.
aboutMe.tools.projectManagement.title: Project Management & Methods
aboutMe.tools.projectManagement.descript: Because every great sprint needs snacks and structure.
aboutProject.title: About the Project
aboutProject.howItStarted.title: How It All Started
aboutProject.howItStarted.paragraph1: It started with coffee and curiosity.
aboutProject.howItStarted.paragraph2: What was meant to be a small test became a full end-to-end project! Now it powers SmartChat, the Cat Wheel of Fortune, and a few spontaneous ideas that somehow work.
aboutProject.techStack.title: Tech Stack (a.k.a. What Keeps It Alive)
aboutProject.techStack.description: This project runs on React for the frontend, styled with Tailwind CSS, and powered by Vite for fast development. The backend is built with Node.js, with Supabase handling authentication and data storage. Real-time communication is handled through WebSockets, and of course ‚Äî the SmartChat AI keeps things interesting.
aboutProject.techStack.subtitle: Main technologies and tools:
aboutProject.features.title: Key Features
aboutProject.features.login.title: Login System
aboutProject.features.smartchat.title: SmartChat AI
aboutProject.features.smartchat.descript: A chatbot with a touch of personality and humor.
aboutProject.features.wheel.title: Cat Wheel of Fortune
aboutProject.features.wheel.description: Spin for random rewards, surprises, and chaos.
aboutProject.features.websocket.title: Real-time communication
aboutProject.features.websocket.descript: WebSockets make interactions instant and dynamic.
aboutProject.features.modular.title: Modular design
aboutProject.features.modular.descriptio: Clean, reusable React components for scalability.
aboutProject.features.responsive.title: Responsive UI
aboutProject.features.responsive.descrip: Built to look good on every screen (and it does).
aboutProject.docs.title: Documentation & Links
aboutProject.docs.subtitle: For those who like to dig deeper or browse through code (you brave soul):
chat.welcome: Hello! I'm an AI chatbot that only talks about cats!
chat.clearMessage: Ask me any question about cats, their behavior, health, grooming or anything related to cats.
smartCat.title: The AI Cat That Knows Everything
smartCat.subtitle: Ask me anything. I'll answer‚Ä¶ unless it's about dogs.
header.noRewards: You haven't won any rewards yet. Spin the wheel to win a reward!
header.footerMessage: No cats were bribed in the making of these rewards.
userMenu.deleteModal.title: Danger Zone Ahead!
userMenu.deleteModal.message1: This action can't be undone ‚Äî unless you know time travel (in which case, cool).
userMenu.deleteModal.message2: Proceed with caution‚Ä¶ and regret later.
wheel.mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to spin the wheel
wheel.title: Spin the Cat Wheel of Fortune and discover your destiny!
wheel.description: Spin the wheel, meow for luck, and see what fate (or your cat) has in store! Remember: nine lives, but only one spin! Prizes may vary depending on the cat's mood. (Good luck with that.)
wheel.modal.title: Behold! The Wheel Has Spoken!
wheel.modal.footer: Don't blame the wheel. Blame the cat that coded it.
wheel.prizeDescriptions.newMeWhoDis: Your old icon is gone. A new identity has appeared. Embrace the chaos, mystery, and possibly worse hair.
wheel.prizeDescriptions.fancySchmancyNic: Your nickname just got a glow-up. Prepare to outshine everyone ‚Äî it's giving ‚ú®main character energy‚ú®.
wheel.prizeDescriptions.chaseTheYarn: A wild yarn ball appears! Push it, chase it, or let it roll into existential questions about your life choices.
wheel.prizeDescriptions.pawSomeCursor: Your cursor is now a cat paw. Warning: excessive cuteness may decrease productivity by 73%.
wheel.prizeDescriptions.royalMeowjesty: You've been knighted by the Cat Kingdom. Please use your power responsibly‚Ä¶ or dramatically.
wheel.prizeDescriptions.colorCatastrophe: Everything pink is now blue, everything blue is now pink. It's fashion. It's chaos. It's art.
wheel.prizeDescriptions.spinAgainBraveSo: Fortune says: "Not today." But you get another chance ‚Äî because persistence (and a bit of luck) never hurt anyone.
wheel.prizeDescriptions.totalCatastrophe: Congratulations! You've achieved absolutely nothing. That's still a kind of win, right? üòπ

goToAbout.title: About (or: How I Ended Up Making This Thing)
goToAbout.subtitle: A mix of design, development, and just enough cat-inspired chaos to make it fun.
forgotNickname.title: Forgot Your Nickname?

forgotNickname.success: We have sent your nickname to your email address.

forgotNickname.error.emailNotFound: No account found with this email address
api.auth.nicknameInvalid: Nickname can only contain letters, numbers, underscore (_) and dash (-)
api.auth.emailNicknameMismatch: Email and nickname do not match
api.auth.emailRegisteredDifferentNicknam: This email is already registered with a different nickname
api.auth.nicknameRegisteredDifferentEmai: This nickname is already registered with a different email
api.auth.nicknameDoesNotMatchEmailAddres: This nickname does not match the email address
api.auth.errorCheckingEmail: An error occurred while checking your email. Please try again.
api.auth.noAccountFound: No account found with this email address
api.auth.nicknameSent: We have sent your nickname to your email address
api.contact.nameEmailMessageRequired: Name, email and message are required
api.contact.removeSpecialCharacters: Please remove special characters like quotes, semicolons, or SQL keywords.
api.contact.removeHtmlTags: Please remove HTML tags and JavaScript code.
api.contact.useStandardText: Please use only standard text characters.
api.chat.messageMustBeText: Message must contain only text characters
api.chat.messageTextOnly: Sorry, message must contain only text characters (letters, numbers, spaces and basic punctuation).
api.chat.onlyTextResponses: Sorry, I can only provide text responses about cats. I cannot generate code, images, files or anything that is not plain text. Ask me a question about cats!
api.chat.askAboutCats: Ask me a question about cats, their behavior, health, grooming or anything related to cats.
api.chat.aiNotConfigured: Sorry, AI service is not configured. Please add OPENAI_API_KEY to the .env file.
api.chat.couldNotGenerateResponse: Sorry, I could not generate a response. Please try again!
api.chat.onlyTextAboutCats: Sorry, I can only provide text responses about cats. Ask me a question about cats!
api.chat.errorCommunicating: Sorry, an error occurred while communicating with the AI service. Please try again in a few moments!
api.chat.errorOccurred: Sorry, an error occurred. Please try again!
api.wheel.mustWait: You must wait before the next spin
api.user.supabaseConnectionFailed: Failed to connect to Supabase. Please check your SUPABASE_URL and ensure the project is active.
